    public abstract class Operator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpressionItem, java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract super-class of all available operators.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Operator

        protected Operator​(java.lang.String operator,
                   int inStackPriority,
                   int outStackPriority,
                   int operandCount,
                   OperatorGroupMode groupMode)
        Constructs an instance of class Operator. You need to determine an in-stack priority and an out-stack priority for this operator. We use an operator stack to transform the infix expression to suffix expression. When a new operator is scanned from infix, the programme will compare its in-stack priority and the out-stack priority of the top element in stack, only when the in-stack priority of new operator is strictly greater than the out-stack priority of the top element, the new priority will be pushed into stack, or the top element will be poped out of stack and be appended to suffix expression. The groupMode may be the following values:
        • OperatorGroupMode.SINGLE - if this operator is used as a single unary or multivariate operator such as "+", "-"
        • OperatorGroupMode.NEEDING_CLOSED - if this operator is the left part of a combined operator such as "(", "|(", "sin(", "["
        • OperatorGroupMode.CLOSING_ONE - if this operator is the right part of a combined operator such as ")", "|)", "]"
        参数:
        operator - the string format of this operator
        inStackPriority - the in-stack priority
        outStackPriority - the out-stack priority
        operandCount - the operand count of this operator
        groupMode - the group mode of this operator.
        Valid values are: OperatorGroupMode.SINGLE, OperatorGroupMode.NEEDING_CLOSED, OperatorGroupMode.CLOSING_ONE

        public final void setStack​(java.util.ArrayDeque<java.lang.Double> stack)
        Set an operand stack for this operator object. This is used for calculate the value of a suffix expression in Expression.
        参数:
        stack - the operand stack

      • needsClosed

        public final boolean needsClosed()
        Check if this operator needs closed. It means it's the left part of a combined operator that an operator needs closed.
        返回:
        if the operator needs closed

      • isClosing

        public final boolean isClosing()
        Check if this operator could close another operator. It means it's the right part of a combined operator that an operator could close another operator.
        返回:
        if the operator could close another operator.

      • solve

        public abstract double solve​(double[] x)
        calculate as a math operator.
        参数:
        x - the array of double operands
        返回:
        the result of this operation

      • execute

        public final void execute​(double... x)
        Invoked by class Expression to solve the value of suffix expression. For an Operator object, this method will invoke the solve(double[]) method to calculate an math operation.
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 ExpressionItem
        参数:
        x - useless for Operator object

      • toString

        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        the string format of this operator

      • hashCode

        public final int hashCode()
        Get hash code. The hash code is contributed as: x,x,(m,m),(o,o,o,o);(c,c,c,c),(i,i,i,i);(s,s,s,s,s,s,s,s;s,s,s,s,s,s,s,s)
        • x: meaningless
        • m: group mode
        • o: out-stack priority
        • c: count of operand
        • i: in-stack priority
        • s: the lower two bytes of hash code of operator string
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        the hash code of this operator

      • equals

        public final boolean equals​(java.lang.Object x)
        Test if this operator equals to another object.
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object
